files.patch:
@@ -57,0 +57,1 @@
+    VECTOR_OP_BIT_COUNT = 3,

@@ -44,0 +44,1 @@
+    public static final int VECTOR_OP_BIT_COUNT = 3;

@@ -684,0 +684,10 @@
+#if[!FP]
+#if[!double]
+            case VECTOR_OP_BIT_COUNT: return (v0, m) ->
+#if[intOrLong]
+                    v0.uOp(m, (i, a) -> ($type$) $Boxtype$.bitCount(a));
+#else[intOrLong]
+                    v0.uOp(m, (i, a) -> ($type$) bitCount(a));
+#end[intOrLong]
+#end[!double]
+#end[!FP]
@@ -2025,0 +2035,13 @@
+#if[!FP]
+#if[!double]
+#if[!intOrLong]
+    static int bitCount($type$ a) {
+#if[short]
+        return Integer.bitCount((int)a & 0xFFFF);
+#else[short]
+        return Integer.bitCount((int)a & 0xFF);
+#end[short]
+    }
+#end[!intOrLong]
+#end[!double]
+#end[!FP]

@@ -564,0 +564,3 @@
+gen_unary_alu_op "BIT_COUNT" "\$Boxtype\$.bitCount(a)" "intOrLong"
+gen_unary_alu_op "BIT_COUNT" "Integer.bitCount((int)a \& 0xFF)" "byte"
+gen_unary_alu_op "BIT_COUNT" "Integer.bitCount((int)a \& 0xFFFF)" "short"
